item.title: Dow, S&P 500 Beat Initial Blues To Rise After ADP Jobs Report Shows Weakness: MRVL, AEO, GTLB, SNOW Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 0.42% at the time of writing, while the S&P 500 rose 0.19%.

item.title: Bessent Reportedly Says Trump Was 'Right' On Tariffs, Notes His 'Maximalist' Approach Gave Leverage In Trade Negotiations
item.description: Speaking during The New York Times DealBook Summit 2025, Bessent acknowledged that his views on tariffs have evolved since 2024.

item.title: What Is OPEC And Why Do Its Decisions Matter?
item.description: OPEC’s exports account for nearly 50% of all the world’s crude exports, and the organization and its allies hold almost 80% of the world’s oil reserve...

item.title: Why Did Capricor Therapeutics Stock Skyrocket Today?
item.description: The HOPE-3 study, involving 106 participants across 20 U.S. centres, delivered strong signals of benefit for muscle and heart function.

item.title: Tesla’s European Woes Deepen As November Registrations Decline 20% In Germany
item.description: The decline comes despite a 58% increase in new BEV registrations in November.
